translation.bem-vindo: Welcome to the page of the Lantern Luminous Institute (ILL), a Civil Association committed to combating abuse against women and their children. Our innovative and playful approach, exemplified by the Mermaid Seas project, seeks not only to protect victims but also to promote structural changes. Through our in-person and online service piers, covering areas such as education, health, justice, and security, we aim to provide comprehensive support and rebuild lives. Join us in this crucial mission to create a more just, safe, and happy society.
